title: Agnes Grey - indicates the narrator has recently

content.prompt: The sentence “Kindness...of it” indicates that the narrator has recently

choices.label: become receptive to the appearance of affection
become willing to express emotions and opinions
decided to act on impulse rather than on reason
adopted a carefree attitude toward life’s challenges

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
